rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 26 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 3:00 PM, 18 June 2025(Wednesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Nueva Ecija, Rizal, Metro Manila and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Tarlac(Bamban, Capas), Pampanga(Mabalacat, Angeles, Porac, Masantol), Zambales(Botolan), Bataan(Balanga, Pilar, Orion), Bulacan(Hagonoy, Plaridel, Pandi), Cavite(Maragondon, Ternate), Batangas(Calaca, Lemery) and Quezon(Tagkawayan) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
